name: Lux (Multiplicity of Choice)
description:
Lux is a quick downloadable HTML game. It will address some of the decisions that go into making a major lifestyle change through the lens of young individuals and their exposure to the fashion industry.  Currently, you can play as Thatch, an anxious college student trying to figure out what life to live out.  Eventually, the game will encompass the journeys of multiple individuals in the industry, as they face challenges and rely on the player to guide them to the best-case scenario. 

Download the game and open the file in your browser to play. 

Leslie Graff -- Game Designer
